CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Case Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( ISPICKVAL( Status,""),"Status, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL( Type ,""), "Type, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Origin ,""), "Origin, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Reason ,""), "Reason, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Priority ,""), "Priority, ","")&""&IF( LEN( Subject )<5, "Meaningful Subject Line","")&""&IF( OR(LEN(ContactId)=0,LEN( AccountId)=0), "Associated Account and Contact",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
